citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:55pm on
December 16th, 2020. I honked the car horn twice, called the provided contact number, and waited 30 minutes.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:55pm on 
December 16th, 2020. I honked the car horn twice, called the provided contact number, and waited 30 minutes. 
 
 
 
End Section
